# default
v       variable        on       FALSE   0                 variable                      
m       macro           on       FALSE   0                 macro                         
# disabling
v       variable        off      FALSE   0                 variable                      
m       macro           off      FALSE   0                 macro                         
# enabling again
v       variable        on       FALSE   0                 variable                      
m       macro           on       FALSE   0                 macro
